mapper.delete: delete from fnd_org_user where id in (${ids})
mapper.update: update fnd_org_user set org_id = #{org_id} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT fou.*,fo.org_name,fu.USER_NAME FROM fnd_org_user fou LEFT JOIN fnd_org fo on fou.org_id = fo.org_id LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu on fou.user_id = fu._id where 1=1 and fou.org_id =#{org_id} ORDER BY update_date desc limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}

SELECT count(1) FROM fnd_org_user fou LEFT JOIN fnd_org fo on fou.org_id = fo.org_id LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu on fou.user_id = fu._id where 1=1 and fou.org_id =#{org_id} ORDER BY update_date desc limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}
